definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: ´[[עֵ֫מֶק הַשּׂ]]: vale of Siddim Ge 14:3 (identif. with Dead Sea), v:Ge 14:8, v:Ge 14:10 (= vale of furrows ? or (Di after Onk Sam of fields (= [[הַשָּׂדִים]]); LXX h( koila\v [faragc] h( a(lukh/; Renan:Hist. Isr. i. 116; Eng. Tr. i. 98 We:Isr. u. Jüd. Gesch. (3) 101 prop. [[הַשֵּׁדִים]] ´[[ע]]: demon-valley).
